summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated Tuesday, August 8, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, leave statuses, and special assignments including security details for a witness protection unit (WITSEC). The document is significant as it provides a snapshot of prison staffing and operations on a date when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated there.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Listed as an officer on the roster, with status changes noted for sick/annual leave and being assigned to INTERNAL post.

persons.name: Perils, C
persons.context: Listed as ADMIN LT on the roster, indicating a supervisory role in the correctional facility.

events.title: MCC Daily Staff Roster
events.description: Standard daily assignment and shift roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: MCC New York New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is a staff roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 8, 2019.
It includes numerous posts and assignments, including special security details labeled 'WITSEC' (Witness Security) and 'ATTY CONF' (Attorney Conference).
The roster tracks staff statuses such as Sick Leave, Annual Leave, Official Time, and training assignments.
The document shows the operational structure of the prison with roles like CAPTAIN, LT, SEC OFFICER, and control posts.
Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at MCC New York in August 2019, making this roster relevant to understanding the facility's operations during his incarceration.
